
                            
                            <p>万能的吧友们，最近我们城市线下的电梯里面看到大量的治鼻炎的广告，这家公司叫清鼻堂，我网上搜了一下全国连锁确实很多门店，光我们本地就有三家！我想问一下有没有吧友去试过有没有效果？主要还是治疗门槛比较高，一个疗程就1780元了！所以开贴问问！ <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/25/172050peq525re7xfqqzyt.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/25/172050peq525re7xfqqzyt.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/25/172051kysse7sy4rkseskz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/25/172051kysse7sy4rkseskz.jpg"> <br>  </p>
